Title: God Bless America
Actors: Joel Murray, Tara Lynne Barr, Melinda Page Hamilton, Mackenzie Brooke Smith
Plot: Loveless, jobless, possibly terminally ill, Frank has had enough of the downward spiral of America. With nothing left to lose, Frank takes his gun and offs the stupidest, cruelest, and most repellent members of society. He finds an unusual accomplice: 16-year-old Roxy, who shares his sense of rage and disenfranchisement.
